[![Scala Steward badge](https://img.shields.io/badge/Scala_Steward-helping-blue.svg?style=flat&logo=data:image/png;base64,)](https://scala-steward.org)

## zio-quickstart.g8

A [Giter8][g8] template for Scala 3 based ZIO powered application with ZIO and zio-http, protoquill, caliban, zio-config, zio-zmx, zio-logging etc.

### Setting up the project

```shell script
sbt new ScalaConsultants/zio-quickstart.g8
```

### Run tests

```shell script
cd <project-name>
sbt test
```
